opinions.title: Magnificent Thoughts
opinions.body:
What is your thoughts on thoughts?
Are you yourself calling a over thinker. Is thinking about something that bad?
Actually, yes without action thinking only is kind of bad. But you should think about your flow of life and everything for that you should find some valuable time in your life. 
You should not think about these on bed before sleep. It can be affect your sleep quality.

opinions.title: Newbies Life
opinions.body: Everyone started the pubg life as newbie once. But suddenly nowadays so many people got transformed to very proffesional players. Meantime there are so many normal players or friends again got loneliness as always

opinions.title: God's Eye
opinions.body: We will be have the access to the every cameras in the world including every mobiles, cctv and car's rear view cam, etc

opinions.title: Do yourself a favor and learn React!
opinions.body:
React is an amazing JavaScript library!

Despite all it's shortcomings.

opinions.title: React has more depth than you might first think!
opinions.body:
React is a great library to learn, but it's not just about the basics. Dive deeper!
For example with this course!
